name: Jell Networks
overview:
Jell Networks provides a web based video collaboration service which integrates video conferencing and social gamification with a proprietary business process. We focus on three areas:

At the enterprise level JellNet provides a command and control feature set which give companies a 360 degree view of their staff’s meeting activities. Additional features address regulatory and compliance issues.

For the Chairperson JellNet provides a single tool which deals with all aspects of setting-up, conducting, and documenting an online business meeting.

For the Participant JellNet rewards team contributions and makes joining and interacting inside a video conference easy.
